TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.

TunableList.name: LOCALE_MAPPING
TunableList.description: A mapping of locale in terms of string to a sim name language in the Language enum. This allows us to use the same random sim name list for multiple locales. You can add new Language enum entries in sims.sim_spawner's Language

TunableList.name: NAME_TYPES_WITH_OPTIONAL_NAMES
TunableList.description: A set of name types with optional last names, along with a percentage chance to actually assign a last name instead of leaving it blank.

TunableTuple.description: Pairing of SimNameType that has an optional name with a percentage chance they actually have the optional name instead of just having nothing. Example: When a random name is assigned, if the name type is in this list, there will be a percentage chance that the name being assigned will have a last name if there are choices to choose from.

Tunable.name: chance_of_random_last_name
Tunable.description: Percent chance that a Sim with an optional name receives that optional name instead of just not having a name at all.

TunableList.name: RANDOM_NAME_TUNING
TunableList.description: A mapping of sim name language to lists of random family name and first names appropriate for that language. This is used to generate random sim names appropriate for each account's specified locale.

TunableTuple.name: random_name_tuning
TunableTuple.description: A list of random names to be used for a specific language.

TunableList.name: female_first_names
TunableList.description: A list of the random female first names that can be assigned in CAS or to randomly generated NPCs.

TunableList.name: female_last_names
TunableList.description: If the specified languages differentiate last names according to gender, this list has to be non-empty. For every last name specified in the 'last_names' list, there must be a corresponding last name in this list. Randomly generated NPCs and NPC offspring will select the corresponding female version if necessary.

Tunable.description: The female version of the last name at the corresponding index in the 'last_name' list.

TunableList.name: last_names
TunableList.description: A list of the random last names that can be assigned in CAS or to randomly generated NPCs.

TunableList.name: male_first_names
TunableList.description: A list of the random male first names that can be assigned in CAS or to randomly generated NPCs.

TunableList.name: SIM_NAME_TYPE_TO_LOCALE_NAMES
TunableList.display: Sim Name Type To Locale Names
TunableList.description: A mapping of SimNameType to locale-specific names. Normally, Sims pull from Random Name Tuning. But if specified with a SimNameType, they will instead pull from this mapping of names.
